name: Plagueheart Bindings
tooltip:
Plagueheart BindingsLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Plagueheart Bindings if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Bindings, 6 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 1 Arcane Crystal and 1 Nexus Crystal.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Bindings
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 6
- Arcane Crystal
- Nexus Crystal
